game_description: After being lost on the water for countless weeks, you finally drift to a mysterious island. Your ordeal has left you exhausted and delirious but you start discovering horrific artifacts and gruesome remains. As you make your way through the forest, you approach a gloomy house in the middle of the island. Discover the forbidden history and terrifying secrets that slowly reveal themselves in Wardwell House. Wardwell House is an innovative and realistic horror game with outstanding atmosphere. You must find hidden clues and objects of interest that slowly reveal the haunting story. Feel the build-up of fear as you traverse the forest and make your way through Wardwell House.
review_1: I'm trying to play while sitting but i can't turn. I just bought it i would like to play but i have mobility issues.
review_2: Wardwell House shows that sometimes less can really give us more and avoids the jump scares in favor of creating an unsettling and scary atmospheric experience. For the complete review, please go to: https://thevrdimension.com/2021/08/15/wardwell-house-the-review/
